subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose scored 23 points, including the go-ahead layup with 17.8 seconds left, to help the Chicago Bulls beat the host Indiana Pacers, 88-84.
snippet: Derrick Rose scored 23 points, including the go-ahead layup with 17.8 seconds left, to help the Chicago Bulls beat the host Indiana Pacers, 88-84.
